page.title: 08KNOCKERDOWN FOLK FESTIVAL
page.content: Excerpt from Matlock Mercury 30/8/85 ENTERTAINMENT-FESTIVAL Next Saturday, September 7, sees the return of the Knockerdown Folk Festival held for the second year at the Knockerdown Public house, near Brassington. Acts include Cosmotheka, of television and radio fame,Tangent who will be playing a concert set and also throughout the festival. Others performing are the Tom Topping Band, Pykestaff Riggs, Culpepper and Dave Sudbury, all of whom will be inside a massive marquee so there are no worries about the weather! At landlord John Bloore's request, No Right Turn will be making a special appearance after proving so popular last year. Whilst travelling home last year two of the band were involved in a serious road accident.
